document.full_text: thousands of people fled their homes along the california coast on friday as a tsunami triggered by the massive earthquake in japan began hitting the u.s. west coast after rolling through hawaii.
document.title: tsunami grazes u.s. west coast, south america next
lines_and_colors: thousands of people fled their homes along the california coast on friday as a tsunami triggered by the massive earthquake in japan began hitting the u.s. west coast after rolling through hawaii.
